message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $11,000. I think it would be a valuable asset to you, and this is a very competitive price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value, but my price reflects the true worth of this product.  I could come down to $10,500, but that's my best offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $10,500. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $10,250. Can you consider that?
